mapper.insert:
insert into
( COL_FORMULA, CAL_ORDER, NUM_DGT, DEC_PRECISION ) values ( #{COL_FORMULA}, #{CAL_ORDER}, #{NUM_DGT}, #{DEC_PRECISION} )
mapper.select: select * from TB_TMPL_CONFIG_BASE order by TABLE_NO

select
from
where DEPT_CODE = #{DEPT_CODE} and BILL_OFF = #{BILL_OFF} and UPPER(TABLE_CODE) = UPPER(#{TABLE_CODE}) and RPT_DUR in (select KEY_VALUE from tb_sys_config where KEY_CODE = 'SystemDataTime') order by COL_HIDE desc, DISP_ORDER
select TABLE_CODE from TB_TMPL_CONFIG_BASE where TB_TMPL_CONFIG_BASE.TABLE_NO = #{TABLE_NO}

SELECT column_name AS COL_CODE, column_comment AS COL_NAME, #{pd.RPT_DUR} as RPT_DUR, #{pd.BILL_OFF} as BILL_OFF, #{pd.DEPARTMENT_CODE} AS DEPT_CODE,#{pd.TABLE_CODE} AS TABLE_CODE,#{pd.DNAME} AS DNAME,#{pd.TABLE_NAME} AS TABLE_NAME, '0' AS DISP_ORDER,'0' AS DICT_TRANS,'1' AS COL_HIDE,'0' AS COL_SUM,'0' AS COL_AVE,'0' AS COL_TRANSFER FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema ='dbgdhs' AND table_name = #{pd.TABLE_CODE}

SELECT UPPER(column_name) column_name, column_comment, UPPER(data_type) data_type, UPPER(column_type) column_type, UPPER(column_key) column_key, column_default FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema ='dbgdhs' AND table_name = #{value}
select 1 from tb_sys_stru_mapping where BUSI_DATE = #{RPT_DUR} LIMIT 1
select 1 from tb_sys_table_mapping where BUSI_DATE = #{RPT_DUR} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into tb_sys_stru_mapping ( TYPE_CODE,TABLE_NAME,TABLE_NAME_MAPPING,COL_CODE,COL_MAPPING_CODE,COL_MAPPING_NAME,COL_VALUE,COL_MAPPING_VALUE,BILL_OFF,BUSI_DATE,DISP_ORDER,COL_DGT,DEC_PRECISION,DICT_TRANS,COL_HIDE,COL_SUM,COL_AVE,COL_TRANSFER ) SELECT TYPE_CODE,TABLE_NAME,TABLE_NAME_MAPPING,COL_CODE,COL_MAPPING_CODE,COL_MAPPING_NAME,COL_VALUE,COL_MAPPING_VALUE,BILL_OFF,#{NEXT_RPT_DUR} as BUSI_DATE,DISP_ORDER,COL_DGT,DEC_PRECISION,DICT_TRANS,COL_HIDE,COL_SUM,COL_AVE,COL_TRANSFER FROM tb_sys_stru_mapping WHERE BUSI_DATE=#{CUR_RPT_DUR}

insert into tb_sys_table_mapping ( TYPE_CODE,BUSI_DATE,TABLE_NAME,TABLE_NAME_MAPPING,STATE,BILL_OFF ) SELECT TYPE_CODE,#{NEXT_RPT_DUR} as BUSI_DATE,TABLE_NAME,TABLE_NAME_MAPPING,STATE,BILL_OFF FROM tb_sys_table_mapping WHERE BUSI_DATE=#{CUR_RPT_DUR}
